cs.FL, cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.LG, cs.CC. 

The paper deals with the problem of sequence prediction using automata, which falls under the category of formal languages and automata theory (cs.FL). The paper also discusses the use of information theory (cs.IT) in analyzing the predictive capabilities of the automata. The study of infinite words and their properties is a topic in theoretical computer science, which is covered by the category of data structures and algorithms (cs.DS). The paper also presents novel prediction algorithms, which can be considered as machine learning techniques, falling under the category of machine learning (cs.LG) or computational complexity (cs.CC).
